title: Which type for Arabian Perfume Oils ?
content:

Hello

I am thinking of going for custom type for the company name.

Can anyone recommend any services for custom type creation ?

Post a web mail address. There are quite a few (a lot) designers on the board who do that kind of work, and I suspect they would prefer that way to bid on the job. They will need to dialog with you about budget, needs, and other information.
